descriptionHtml:
To be perfectly honest I\'ve just wanted to see how the new file publishing system works, so I have made this little ingenious mod that lets you get to the Hight Hrotgar much quicker by placing  shortcut on the road between Haemar\'s Shame and Falkreath Stormcloak Camp, see image for exact location.

Installation:

Manual or with NMM I don\'t really care how you do it :)

Uninstallation:

See above.

Materials & tools used:

box of nails, hammer, calipers, screwdriver, two big snowy rocks, one medium snowy rock, big cup of coffee, two cigarettes, ancient nordic pickaxe, Creation Kit
author: Me
